channel.title: Comments on: Review of the Year – 2006

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>OK, this is odd.</p><p>I had assumed that the problem was caused because I'm using Directory Assistance for the Defectr users (i.e. they're in a secondary NAB). I had been refreshing the views in that NAB, but I tried doing the same on the main NAB and it now seems to work. I'll post a proper explanation tomorrow, but thanks for the prompt Bill!</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
OK, this is odd.

I had assumed that the problem was caused because I’m using Directory Assistance for the Defectr users (i.e. they’re in a secondary NAB). I had been refreshing the views in that NAB, but I tried doing the same on the main NAB and it now seems to work. I’ll post a proper explanation tomorrow, but thanks for the prompt Bill!

Matt

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Hey Bill, thanks for that. I am doing the refresh but it's not taking effect for about 5 minutes. I always over-estimate the timings when talking to users to cater for unforeseen delays.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hey Bill, thanks for that. I am doing the refresh but it’s not taking effect for about 5 minutes. I always over-estimate the timings when talking to users to cater for unforeseen delays.

Matt

item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>In terms of Defectr: </p><p>"I created a new Team Member and they can't log in<br/>Currently it takes our servers a little time to catch up with new registrations, we are working on this but until then it can take up to 15 minutes for a new account to work. Why not use the time to appreciate the wonder of the world around you or to hug a colleague."</p><p>Just refresh the names.nsf views.. Do a "load updall names.nsf" with a couple of views - which I cant remember offhand....</p><p>---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
In terms of Defectr:

“I created a new Team Member and they can’t log in
Currently it takes our servers a little time to catch up with new registrations, we are working on this but until then it can take up to 15 minutes for a new account to work. Why not use the time to appreciate the wonder of the world around you or to hug a colleague.”

Just refresh the names.nsf views.. Do a “load updall names.nsf” with a couple of views – which I cant remember offhand….

—* Bill
